"Improve your time management skills by utilizing productivity tools and techniques, such as the Pomodoro Technique, time blocking, and prioritizing tasks based on their urgency and importance."
"Consider outsourcing tasks that take up too much of your time, such as data entry or administrative work, to free up time for more important tasks."
"Take breaks throughout the day to recharge and refresh your mind, which can help you stay focused and efficient."

"Implement a system for tracking your progress and measuring your productivity, such as using a task management app or spreadsheet, to help you identify areas for improvement and make adjustments accordingly."
"Consider taking a course or workshop on time management and productivity to learn new skills and techniques that can help you work more efficiently and effectively."
